Author: alchademy
Text: You’re right, thank you. My mom keeps telling me this as well.

Author: rachelseaturtle
Text: I’m sorry so much of the day will be tainted/outright ruined by your mental state.    Can you reality check about how they’re going to remember this day? Idk these people ofc but It seems unlikely to me that they’ll be hyper focused on your weight, that it would overshadow the accomplishment of graduation.
